Name: Strip 4: Detention Bounce
About the game: You got school detention for being naughty. Maybe it is not that bad, teacher wants to play with you. Long awaited second episode of a popular game and a meme. Classic tabletop game in an intimate atmosphere. Connect four (aka Four in a row, Gravitrips) combined with strip game. Every time you win, she will take off one piece of clothes. All characters are over the age of 18.
